title: Please launch a Pakistani server for League of Legends
body: Asslam O Alaikum! Please launch a Pakistani server. Many of us stop playing this game because of high pings. We also expect taking part in international tournaments. I on behalf of Pakistan request the whole Riot team to please think about launching a Pakistani server. Thanks a lot!

replies.body:
Wa-Alaikum-Salaam! (I hope that was phrased correctly ^_^)

We definitely want to make sure everyone across the globe is able to play sufficiently, but sometimes things like finding suitable server locations can get in the way. I wish I had more info about a possible Pakistani server but at this point I don't have too much on that topic. You might actually be able to get a more in-depth answer from some of the devs by posting this over in [**Client Discussion**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) though!
I will and yes you phrased it correctly :D

> Wa-Alaikum-Salaam! (I hope that was phrased correctly ^_^)

It is correct.

Well if you're playing on the NA server, of course you're going to get high ping. Switch to the EUWest server. There you'll get 130-150-170 ping which isn't bad at all for Pakistan although fiber lines are having issues right now from the Transworld undersea cables having problems.
